meta.description: Definitions of the different pieces that are allowed in the track layout.

startPostion.description: Start position of the track layout

LGB-300.description: LGB 10000, Piko 35208 or equivalent 300mm straight track section

LGB-600.description: LGB 10600, Piko 35208, or equivalent 600mm straight track section

LGB-150.description: LGB 10150 or equivalent 150mm straight track section

LGB-R1-30°.description: LGB 11000 (R1), Piko 35211, or equivalent 600mm radius 30° curved track section

LGB-R1-15°.description: LGB 11020 (R1) or equivalent 600mm radius 15° curved track section

LGB-R3-22.5°.description: LGB 16000 (R3) or equivalent 1200mm radius 22.5° curved track section

LGB-R1-SL.description: LGB 12050, Piko 35220, or equivalent 600mm radius left switch

LGB-R1-SR.description: LGB 12000, LGB 12150, Piko 35221, or equivalent 600mm radius right switch

LGB-R3-SL.description: LGB 16050, Piko 35222 (close enough), or equivalent 1200mm radius left switch

LGB-R3SR.description: LGB 16150, Piko 35223 (close enough), or equivalent 1200mm radius right switch
